Full Description: Miros utilizes advanced AI technology to analyze shopper behaviors, identifying key interactions like scrolls and clicks to enhance user experience. This innovative feature allows customers to browse the store without typing, improving engagement and simplifying the shopping process. Miros also offers insights and expert blogging on leveraging AI for product discovery to help grow e-commerce businesses.  --- eCommerce loses half of its sales because in this industry nobody knows how to make the products findable. If you can’t find, you can’t buy. No universal taxonomy exists to describe visual items. Shoppers do not know the right words to search for what they like. Meanwhile, because you can’t filter products by how much you like them, you’ll have to browse thousands of products – many of which you’ll dislike. When shopping feels tedious, the shopper quits. Miros gives shoppers a new language to express what they are looking for - far richer and more accurate than any existing search technology.
Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), E-Commerce, Fashion, Product Search, Retail Technology, Search Engine

Full Description: NitroVolt is decarbonizing nitrogen-based fertilizer production and making the agricultural sector more resilient with a novel production process. Commercial ammonia production supports 40-50% of the agricultural industry as a nitrogen-based fertilizer. But current ammonia production is not sustainable, releasing over 1% of global greenhouse gas emissions during production facilities and further emissions during transportation to the end user, farmers. NitroVolt offers a local ammonia production solution that gives farmers the ability to produce their own nitrogen-based fertilizer. The only inputs required by NitroVolt’s container-sized systems are air, water, and electricity, enabling production of sustainable ammonia directly at farms. NitroVolt’s patented electrochemical Nitrolyzer unit can make ammonia on-demand with intermittent renewable energy sources. With their technology, NitroVolt aims to decarbonize nitrogen-based fertilizer production one farm at a time, cut the logistic costs of distributing fertilizer, and make the agricultural sector more resilient to external factors.
Industries: Agriculture, AgTech, CleanTech, Energy Storage, Fuel, GreenTech, Renewable Energy, Sustainability
Description: NitroVolt is a green ammonia startup developing a small-scale ammonia synthesis unit, to give farmers control over fertilizer production.
Top 5 Investors: Division Q, Export and Investment Fund, Breakthrough Energy Ventures, Satgana, BackingMinds
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Energy, Sustainability
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Nordic Countries, Scandinavia

We're the first integrated research platform for capital markets that supports an interconnected central repository for external and internal data (including time series, text, emails, docs, news, research, transcripts, reports and more). Full Description: We believe in the power of AI-driven knowledge management to transform businesses and improve people's work lives. It has the potential to revolutionize industries, create new opportunities, and provide greater efficiency and transparency in organizational knowledge. However, we also recognize that this transformative technology is not without challenges. Many companies struggle with scattered information, poor data quality, and a general distrust in AI solutions. This threatens the productivity and competitiveness of businesses, particularly in the underserved Mittelstand segment of the DACH region. Companies are losing billions annually due to knowledge silos and inefficient information management. We were tired of watching from the sidelines, so we created Blockbrain with the ambition to fill the missing trust in AI-powered knowledge management. We aim to build the technological bridge toward mainstream adoption of secure, efficient, and ethical AI solutions. At Blockbrain, we've developed a proprietary LLM-agnostic data processing infrastructure that transforms complex, unstructured data into actionable insights. Our commitment to transparent, explainable, and ethical AI, combined with the highest data privacy standards (made in Germany, GDPR compliant), sets us apart in the market. We're not just observers; we're actively working to revolutionize how businesses manage and leverage their knowledge, driving unparalleled productivity gains and competitiveness in the AI era.
Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Business Process Automation (BPA), Chatbot, Knowledge Management, SaaS
Description: SaaS-Plattform für KI-gestütztes Knowledge Management
Founders: Antonius Gress, Johannes Strachwitz, Mattias Protzmann, Nam Hai Ngo, Oliver Rebner
Top 5 Investors: Plug and Play, Blockchain Founders Fund, w3.fund, Mätch VC, Giesecke+Devrient Ventures
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Other, Science and Engineering, Software

Full Description: Rabbitt.AI recently raised seed funding of 2.1 Million USD and got backed by TC Group, NVIDIA, Meta and Microsoft executives etc. With Rabbitt, we are helping organisations "Own their Data and Own their AI". Founded by a serial entrepreneur and IIT Delhi alumni, Mr. Harneet Singh has an experience of building 5 companies from scratch and scaling and managing P&L of 1 Billion+.  Popularly known as "The Lion Founder" among the GenAI community, Mr. Singh is also a member of Forbes Business Council, Confederation of Indian Industry (CII), and served as an AI consultant with South Korean Navy. In the new world, we are helping companies become the Landlords of AI world rather than just the Tenants like the past Internet world. Rabbitt AI works with enterprises to help them customise LLMs for specific use cases and develop AI applications on top of Generative AI models. We are like the WITCH (Wipro, Infosys, TCS, Cognizant and HCL) all combined but for Gen AI world. Our philosophy is that "in the Gen AI world, Big is no longer Beautiful, rather Small is Soothing". Smaller, custom and industry specific fine tuned models are making more moves than one big model. At Rabbitt AI, we are the advocates of these and helping companies adopt Open Source AI models like LLama, Mistral, Falcon, BLOOM, Gemma etc. Our platform offers a robust suite of tools, including core generative AI capabilities, custom LLM development, RAG fine-tuning, data-centric AI, MLOps integration, and voice bot AI agents. By combining these features, we enables businesses to create powerful AI solutions. Through our proprietary LLM fine-tuning platform, Custom Datasets, RLHF techniques, RAG Implementation and Mixture of Agents (MoA) approach, we are training open source LLMs for various industry use cases like (Education, Healthcare, Customer Experience, Recruitment, Marketing), and deploying them on private clouds. We have optimised costs, performance and data security for our 70+ clients and surpassed top proprietary LLMs like OpenAI's GPT 4o and Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet in performance and costs.
Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data Collection and Labeling, Enterprise Software, Generative AI, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing

Full Description: Kolet’s mission? Internet access for all. Founded at the beginning of 2024 by 4 entrepreneurs, Eduardo Ronzano, Anne-Carole Cöen, Jérémy Gotteland, and Mehdi Chraibi, Kolet is an innovative startup in the eSIM market.  Faced with the exorbitant costs of Internet access abroad, and the often obscure and abusive practices of telecom players, Kolet wants to build a new operator that is responsible, accessible and transparent.  Kolet aims to shake things up and give power back to consumers, thanks to an intuitive application, proactive customer service, affordable prices and a single eSIM to download, simplifying life for travelers no matter how many trips they make. Finally, Kolet aims to contribute to a more responsible world, both environmentally and socially. By reducing the significant footprint of physical SIM cards in circulation around the world, and widening access to the Internet, Kolet is actively helping to bridge the digital divide. The Kolet app is already available on iOS & Android. People can enjoy Internet access in over 130 countries at super competitive price.
Description: Kolet is an eSIM card provider that enables users to stay connected to the mobile internet while traveling through an app.

Full Description: Bourgeois Bohème (BoBo) is a financial platform that streamlines high-value transactions and cash flow management for (U)HNWIs, bridging the gap between traditional private banks, financial advisors, and the global, digital-first generation. With 75% of next-gen wealth operating internationally, legacy systems are hindered by slow transaction approvals and costly cross-border fees, falling short of the expectations of tech-savvy millennial and Gen Z clients. BoBo offers cross-border wire transfers and card transactions of up to €1,000,000, eliminating the delays and support calls typical of traditional banking. BoBo was founded in 2018 by the Würms family, with deep roots in private banking and multi-family office management across Europe and Latin America, alongside Gregor Anton Piëch, with a German family heritage in car making. The company's vision was brought to life by the members of the founding team: Hugo Gomez, a former HSBC banker with over 15 years of experience in finance, Katherine Maslova, a former private banking executive and tech entrepreneur, and Simon Isaev, a high-level IT advisor and a successful businessman. BoBo's hallmark feature is its multi-tiered cash flow and household management platform, enabling clients to issue high-limit accounts to family members and staff, including private employees like assistants and drivers, with customizable spending limits for seamless expense management. Since its open market soft launch in 2024, BoBo has attracted over 300 B2C affluent clients and generated more than 3,000 leads. Powered by Mastercard and the exclusive private club TENco, BoBo has established a growing partnership network, including Four Seasons, Cartier, Boucheron, and more. Operating under the EEA and UK Electronic Money Institution (EMI) licenses, the company is headquartered in Lithuania, serving clients across the UK and Europe.
Description: Bourgeois Bohème (BoBo) is a financial platform that streamlines high-value transactions and cash flow management for (U)HNWIs.

Industry Groups: Apps, Financial Services, Payments, Software
Headquarters Regions: European Union (EU), Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Whether you're a patient recovering from knee surgery or a desk worker starting to feel an ache in your back, the first step to getting you back to your best is getting an accurate measurement of your issue.  Vitrue's products accurately and objectively measure musculoskeletal issues from the workplace to the clinic. VIDA is a tech-driven, fully managed service to reduce musculoskeletal problems like back and neck pain in desk workers. All while making companies DSE compliant for remote, office and hybrid teams. By assessing the quality of desk workers’ workspaces through cutting-edge AI, VIDA is a modern and scalable solution with impactful benefits. 65% of employees are living​​ with MSK issues like back or neck pain. In most cases, this is entirely preventable. With VIDA, you can empower your team to improve their workspace by giving them the knowledge they need to reduce pain and improve their quality of life.  Vitrue EVVA uses depth sensors to perform clinical grade assessments of patients and is used in orthopaedics, elite sport injury prevention and preventative health screening. We provide computer vision based biomechanics measurement technology to assess your clients’ performance of gold standard functional movements pre and post treatment and throughout rehabilitation. We provide data to both clinicians and patients to ensure issues are detected early, optimal treatment can be designed and patients are informed and engaged throughout their experience. Our mission is to provide a new foundation for musculoskeletal healthcare and reduce MSK pain in millions of people.
Industries: Health Care, Health Diagnostics, Home Health Care, Human Resources, Wellness
Description: Computer vision technology to assess and treat musculoskeletal issues like back pain.
Top 5 Investors: Techstars, Innovate UK, MMC Ventures, Salica, EIT Health
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Health Care
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Cytix is the first truly continuous security testing platform, focused on identifying change and using it to intelligently determine when to test. Whether it’s a developer making a pull request, threat intelligence about a new vulnerability, or a new server being deployed, we take feeds of data from across your technology stack and use this as telemetry to determine what has changed and what actions need to be taken to assess the impact that this has had on security. Simply connect us to your existing workflows through our list of pre-built integrations or leverage the suite of native tools within our platform. We bridge the gap between automation and manual testing by identifying what actions are needed at any time and carrying them out as a sequence of tasks. Through this, we are able to minimise the time between vulnerabilities being introduced and being identified, and provide the information you need in order to resolve them as efficiently as possible. We support applications, APIs, cloud-native services, and traditional infrastructure, providing you with a centralised platform from which to build a continuous security testing programme. We are CREST-accredited and our product can either be used to drive an internal security testing programme, or as a fully managed service. Watch as your entire security testing programme runs automatically.
Industries: Cloud Security, Cyber Security, Network Security, Penetration Testing, Software

Full Description: At CellVoyant Technologies Limited, we are pioneering the future of biotechnology with our AI-first approach to stem cell-based therapies. Founded in 2021, our mission is to revolutionize the treatment of chronic diseases by leveraging cutting-edge technology to develop novel therapies. Our advanced platform utilizes AI-driven live cell imaging to predict and optimize stem cell differentiation, enabling us to manufacture any cell and tissue in the human body at scale with unparalleled precision. Rooted in the groundbreaking research from the Carazo Salas lab at the University of Bristol, our technology represents the intersection of cell biology, computer vision, engineering, and machine learning. We are committed to translating next-generation science from research into real-world applications, addressing some of the most pressing challenges in healthcare. Our dedicated team, led by Founder & CEO Rafael Carazo, is supported by a network of visionary investors who were early backers of AI pioneers such as DeepMind, Exscientia, Recursion, and Wayve. Additionally, we benefit from the support of the founder/CEO of Abcam, a leader in the antibody business. With $2.5M in annual revenue and a seed funding round, CellVoyant is well-positioned to make a significant impact on the biotechnology landscape. Join us on our journey as we strive to make transformative therapies a reality. At CellVoyant, we are not just advancing science—we are shaping the future of medicine. Explore opportunities to collaborate, invest, or learn more about our innovative solutions by visiting our website at https://cellvoyant.tech or contacting us at admin@cellvoyant.tech.
Headquarters Location: Bristol, Bristol, City of, United Kingdom
Description: AI-driven stem cell therapies for chronic diseases. Innovating with precision to manufacture cells and tissues at scale.

Full Description: Testmate Health is a medtech startup and award-winning spin-off of University of Geneva (Switzerland). We have developed a smartphone compatible platform test kit that diagnoses any disease with an identifiable DNA or RNA sequence - without the need for a lab, providing results directly at home in minutes.  Based on this platform, our first solution is the first rapid urine self-test for the four most common sexually transmitted diseases (STD). One million new STDs are diagnosed a day, and yet the best improvements to date still need a lab, with results taking up to 7 days to be ready. Our easy to use all-in-one-kit provides results in minutes, anywhere, at any time, and the result is scannable by a smartphone to enable people to immediately gain access to treatment – if needed. Further test-kits with other diseases are in the pipeline to empower users to skip the waiting room, and take charge of their health from home.

Full Description: Have you ever spent countless hours tediously sifting through huge piles of customer feedback?  Caplena.com uses Augmented Intelligence to drastically reduce the amount of time it takes to analyze large amounts of free text from reviews or responses to open-ended questions. It all began when one of the co- founders, Maurice, won the prestigious SemEval competition for his Master Thesis. He began to explore ideas in the Natural Language Processing (NLP) field with his colleague Pascal, a Machine Learning Engineer specializing in the field of Natural Language and Computer Vision. They soon realized a gap in the industry when Link and Success Drivers - two Market Research firms - inquired if the same technology could help them with open-ended survey coding. As it turned out, almost all firms that handle customer feedback face the same issue: too many open ends and not enough time to accurately analyze them all. Four months later, Pascal and Maurice had completed the first prototype - and things began to take off quickly. Since its inception in the spring of 2017, Caplena has doubled the number of text responses it processes every six months, with over 50M verbatims processed to date. Today Caplena serves companies in more than 15 countries.  From rapidly growing start-ups like Joyn to Fortune 500 companies like eBay & DHL - we have managed to achieve unparalleled customer loyalty. Building on that trust and keeping innovation at the core of everything we do, it is our mission to support any insight team that analyses any kind of open-ended feedback.
Industries: Analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Machine Learning, Market Research, Text Analytics
Description: Caplena.com - The Fastest Way To Get Valuable Insights Out Of Open-Ended Customer Feedback

Full Description: Today, neurological conditions are the Number 1 cause of poor health, disability and premature death worldwide, impacting lives of all ages, lifestyles and backgrounds. Therapeutic proteins hold incredible potential in the treatment of these conditions, but their application is limited because the physical properties of proteins make it challenging for them to pass through the blood-brain barrier (a semi-permeable membrane that regulates the passage of large and small molecules into the brain tissue) and to reach their target sites.  At Release Tx, we are a preclinical-stage BioMedTech company developing the first cell macroencapsulation technology specifically designed to deliver diverse, potent therapeutic proteins beyond the human blood-brain barrier. We’re innovating at the nexus of biotech and MedTech with a cutting-edge, proprietary technology that consists of a versatile, implantable and biocompatible cell macroencapsulation device, no larger than a pin, and a genetically engineered cell line capable of producing a broad range of proteins for long-term delivery to the CNS and beyond. Our dedicated team brings together tremendous experience developing novel therapies from bench to bedside and has been instrumental in the evolution of this technology, from ideation to a potentially life-transforming reality.      Collaborating with the Paris Brain Institute, ranking 2nd in the world in the field of neurology research, and Minaris Regenerative Medicine, a leading CDMO with expertise in cell and gene therapies, we’ve demonstrated in animal models that our technology can reverse the progression of rare genetic diseases of the CNS. With two seminal publications by Cell Press journals in 2022 and 2023, we’ve made a major leap towards treating genetic diseases of the CNS without gene therapy, heralding a new era of hope for patients and their families around the world.
Description: Release Therapeutics is a biotechnology research company that gets therapeutic proteins where they are needed most in the CNS and beyond.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA)

Full Description: Carcinotech is revolutionising cancer research by manufacturing 3D-printed micro-tumours using patient-derived biopsies, primary cells, immune cells, and cancer stem cells. Our advanced offering provides a platform for rapid, ethical, and accurate drug screening, pre-clinical, and personalised medicine testing. Carcinotech’s goal is to accelerate drug screening and enable the delivery of more effective cancer treatments to market. Using patient biopsies, tissue engineering, advanced robotic manufacturing, and quality control to produce highly predictive, assay-ready printed tumours at significant throughput. This provides our clients with a “clinical biopsy” quality model, using isolated patient-specific cells and representing donor-specific cancer heterogeneity. Our vision is to be at the forefront of cancer drug testing and provide personalised medicine testing to each individual suffering from cancer to better their chance of treatment and survival. Working with global partners, leading pharma companies, surgeons, pathologists, and clinicians Carcinotech is changing the face of oncology drug development by working to make this vision a reality.

Full Description: We are shaping the lightweight construction market of the future. Blackwave is a lightweight construction company that develops and produces high-performance components made of carbon fiber reinforced plastics (CFRP) for automotive, aerospace, medical technology, sports equipment and mechanical engineering sectors.  We have specialised in Carbon-Sheet Moulding Compound (C-SMC), in which the material is pressed into shape using high pressure and heat. The components produced are "cast in one piece", have highly complex 3D geometries and can be manufactured quickly and economically. By integrating ribs, different wall thicknesses or functional elements such as threads and fits, highly integral components are created which cannot be produced with conventional carbon manufacturing processes. The new design freedoms are the key to a number of new applications and industries. Carbon is thus gaining in importance in all industries where lightweight components (automotive, aerospace, medical technology, sports equipment and mechanical engineering) make a difference.

Full Description: Our platform SongPush seamlessly connects the music industry with the influencer industry by enabling viral music promotion campaigns on all relevant social media platforms.  Artists or record labels provide their music on the platform and can directly place it into the content of influencers. This can be a placement into a livestream on Twitch/YouTube or starting a TikTok challenge with hundreds of influencers at once.  Our precise matching engine based on genres, subgenres, moods & language enables artists or record labels to find the right influencers for promoting their music. On the other side, influencers get paid to place the music into their content and can therefore easily monetize their reach. Music is also way easier to integrate into content than regular product placements. At the same time, SongPush is cutting out the tiring process of inefficient back and forth negotiations via mail. Both parties involved profit from our fast and easy deal making process. Our data-driven platform analyzes all relevant campaign data to gain long-term insights about which music works best with which influencer and audience. For each successful cooperation between artist & influencer, SongPush charges a commission fee of ~25%. We envision SongPush as the global interface for placing music on social media and make it the leading platform for music marketing.  Why are we doing it? Our goal is to ideally match the world’s music to the right listeners and enable it to create meaningful connections.
Description: Our platform seamlessly connects music (artists/labels) with social media (creators/agencies).

Full Description: Suiso is developing a breakthrough microwave-driven pyrolysis process which generates Hydrogen by decarbonising Natural/Bio Gas.  Ventured backed and based in Sheffield UK, Suiso is a winner of the BEIS Low Carbon H2 Supply scheme.  It plans to deliver shipping container sized Hydrogen generators, with a capacity to provide of up to 1,000kg of Hydrogen daily.  A competitive benchmarking exercise, in the BEIS study, has confirmed that Suiso will have the lowest cost of H2 in a number of key H2 applications and lower Carbon emissions than grid powered electrolysis.  By producing Hydrogen at the point of use, Suiso eliminates the expensive distribution costs incurred by large scale centralised H2 producers, one of the primary obstacles to the widespread adoption of Hydrogen.  Suiso’s process reduces CO2 emissions by 97%+ versus steam methane reforming, utilizes 80% less energy than electrolysis and has very low equipment capital costs making it one of the most affordable Hydrogen production technologies.  Suiso captures the Carbon in the Natural/Bio-Gas in the form of solid Carbon Black which has significant commercial value in the production of tyres, batteries, inks, other applications.
Description: Suiso is developing microwave-driven Hydrogen generators which decarbonise Natural/Bio Gas

Full Description: EnerClock is at the forefront of the energy management revolution, providing cutting-edge digital solutions that empower users to optimize their energy usage and contribute to a sustainable future. EnerClock is a central component of this vision, offering a customizable interface that integrates seamlessly with various energy assets, including solar panels, EV chargers, and smart meters. Designed for flexibility and convenience, EnerClock allows users to monitor and control their energy consumption in real time. By providing insights into energy flows, costs, and emission reductions, the platform enables users to make informed decisions to enhance energy efficiency and reduce operational costs. EnerClock also features advanced functionalities such as load prioritization and remote diagnostics, ensuring that users can maintain optimal energy management without the help of onsite technicians. EnerClock’s platform is built on the XENON framework, which connects distributed energy resources into a cohesive system. This integration supports various use cases, from home energy management to large-scale virtual power plants, making EnerClock a versatile solution for both residential and commercial users. The platform is fully customizable, allowing businesses to incorporate their branding and tailor the interface to their specific needs. With robust security features, including two-factor authentication and over-the-air updates, EnerClock ensures that user data is protected while maintaining the latest software capabilities. The company’s commitment to innovation and sustainability makes EnerClock a leader in the energy management sector, driving the transition to a decentralized and sustainable future.
Description: Energy Management, IoT, Artificial Intelligence

Full Description: suena, born out of a vision to be catalyst for the energy transition, is a Hamburg based green-tech start-up founded in 2021. As a route-to-market provider, suena offers advanced optimization and energy trading services for large-scale energy storages. Having recognized the still untapped potential of flexibility, suena developed the Autopilot to optimize the monetization of energy storage through a multi-market approach, that combines all relevant revenue streams of electricity and balancing markets. Considering forecasts, real time market data and battery aging models the Autopilot determines and executes the optimal trading schedule. By making flexibility within the energy system usable and profitable for all stakeholders and integrating it seamlessly, suena aims to increase storage adoption to accelerate the energy transition. Even though the journey is complex, suena is ready to lead the charge to a sustainable energy system with the right tool to enable the global shift towards sustainable energy.
Industries: Energy, Energy Storage, Renewable Energy, SaaS, Software, Trading Platform

Our goal is to cover all the channels restaurants need to communicate with their customers online into one platform, provide customers with advanced insights and increase guest retention.
